title: Tony Hawk
alt: Bad idea #271: Dropping into the half-pipe on a Segway.
transcript:
My Hobby:
Doing skateboard tricks in Tony Hawk while also doing them in real life.
[Cueball moves towards a quarter pipe on his skateboard while manipulating his PSP.]
Beep
Click
Beep[Cueball is in mid air having performed a Frontside 360°, both literally and on the PSP.]
♪ Frontside 360°! ♫
Frontside 360°!
